Reviews.Title: phones
Reviews.Author: grandma1946
Reviews.Content: this is the best phone they ever made if you just want a easy  phone to work.  thanks Cindy God Bless

Reviews.Title: Motorola w755 Phone
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: The phone can with a tons of scratches. Some of the corners of the phone were torn apart. The life expectancy was too short. The front display was all fuzzy and scratch. It was a horrible experience.

Reviews.Title: This is a wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: Adelheid Mueller "Heidi"
Reviews.Content: The sound quality is the best out there. Of course they don't make it anymore.
